Title: Fast-reconfigurable optical interconnect architecture based on time-synchronized node coordination for high performance computing
Abstract: © OSA 2017.We propose a Fast-Reconfigurable Optical Interconnect (FROI) architecture enabled by time-synchronized node coordination for high performance computing. Experimental results show that an ultra-low reconfiguration time of 45.61s can be achieved after traffic pattern changes.
